sentences.en: All humans do have some kind of innate mental ability.
sentences.cn: 凡是人确有某种天生的智力.

sentences.en: Children have an innate ability to learn language.
sentences.cn: 儿童学习语言的能力是与生俱来的。

sentences.en: Correct ideas are not innate in the mind.
sentences.cn: 人的正确思想不是自己头脑中固有的.

sentences.en: Cowperwood's innate financial ability did not reassure Stener in this hour.
sentences.cn: 柯帕乌天赋的理财才能在这时候却不能再鼓舞斯坦纳的信心.

sentences.en: He consequently believes in an innate tendency towards progressive and more perfect development.
sentences.cn: 因此,他相信生物有一种内在的倾向,使它朝着进步和更完善的方向发展.

sentences.en: He failed dismally where the woman was slightly experienced and possessed innate refinement.
sentences.cn: 但是碰到稍有经验,情感高雅的女子时,他就一筹莫展,不能得手了.

sentences.en: His innate good - nature, however, dictated a favourable reply.
sentences.cn: 但是他天生的好心肠使他一口答应了下来.

sentences.en: Home ownership has been an overarching and innate desire of the British.
sentences.cn: 拥有私宅是所有英国人心中压倒一切和根深蒂固的强烈愿望。

sentences.en: Ideas of earthly superiority are educational, not innate.
sentences.cn: 尘世上优越的观念是来自教育, 而不是与生俱来.
知识是后天获得的, 不是先天就有的.

sentences.en: Nature's innate rhythms gave shape to this writing.
sentences.cn: 大自然内在的节奏使他的作品自有一格.

sentences.en: the innate conservatism of older people
The innate resistance thought to be related to the activity of macrophages.
sentences.cn: 先天性抵抗力被认为与巨噬细胞的活性有关.

sentences.en: Their music speaks to us with an innate grandeur we can all understand.
sentences.cn: 他们的音乐里流露出一种我们都能体会到的天生的高贵。

sentences.en: This passage may be interpreted as a recognition of an innate moral sense in man.
sentences.cn: 这段话可以被解释为对人类固有的道德意识的认识.

sentences.en: You obviously have an innate talent for music.
sentences.cn: 你显然有天生的音乐才能.

words.tran_cn: [医]先天的；固有的；与生俱来的

trans.tran_cn: 天生的，特有的，固有的，内在的，直觉的
trans.tran_en: an innate quality or ability is something you are born with
